title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Role-Play-Based Leadership Training for Nursing Delegation Decision-Making

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental nursing workflows and foundational leadership knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate nursing delegation recipients in given patient scenarios.
Learners can resolve conflict situations that may arise during the delegation process with 80% accuracy through role-playing.
Learners enhance their ability to prioritize tasks using delegation checklists developed by teams.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
